description: Basic plan output with issues to create

issues.title: Add Redis for session caching
issues.body:
## Overview

Implement Redis-based session caching to improve performance.

## Tasks

- [ ] Set up Redis in Docker Compose
- [ ] Configure Django to use Redis for sessions
- [ ] Add health checks for Redis connection
- [ ] Update documentation

## Acceptance Criteria

- Sessions are stored in Redis
- Redis is available in development and production
- Health endpoint checks Redis connectivity

issues.title: Implement query result caching
issues.body:
## Overview

Add caching for expensive database queries.

## Tasks

- [ ] Identify queries to cache
- [ ] Implement cache decorator
- [ ] Add cache invalidation triggers
- [ ] Add metrics for cache hit/miss rates

## Acceptance Criteria

- High-traffic queries are cached
- Cache is invalidated on relevant data changes
- Metrics are available in Grafana

output.summary_comment:
Based on this discussion, I've created the following issues:

1. **Add Redis for session caching** - Setting up Redis infrastructure and Django integration
2. **Implement query result caching** - Adding caching for expensive database queries

These issues are now ready for prioritization and assignment.
